Aboutme: As a self-taught web developer, I have mastered the MERN stack, Python, and SQL through hands-on projects.I build dynamic web apps from scratch, leveraging Git/GitHub for version control. Passionate about learning and  problem-solving, I‚Äôm eager to grow and contribute to full-stack development.
Instaclone: Instaclone, a MERN stack project inspired by Instagram, replicates its core functionalities. Users can upload, share, and engage with short video clips known as reels, ensuring a seamless experience with real-time updates and responsive design. Leveraging MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js, Instaclone provides a familiar platform for users to connect, explore, and engage with multimedia content, resembling Instagram's features in a personalized environment.
ONLINEFILES: This is a project to create and store files at online in your account and accessing it at anywhere you want . ensuring a seamless experience with real-time updates and responsive design. Leveraging MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js, Instaclone provides a familiar platform for users to store files online . It have crud operations to allow the valid users to access files.
MEETCHAT: MeetChat is a dynamic and secure chat room application enabling seamless communication among users. Personalized rooms with unique names and passwords ensure privacy, while join limits add an extra layer of security. With a focus on user experience and privacy, MeetChat is the ideal solution for reliable communication. MeetChat is developed using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js.
MESSAGEENCRYPTERANDDECRYPTER: Developed a secure message encrypter and decrypter that ensures data privacy using strong encryption algorithms. It allows users to encrypt and decrypt messages efficiently, preventing unauthorized access. Built with a focus on security and ease of use, showcasing expertise in cryptography and secure software development.
COLLEGEDETAILSWITHAPI: Developed a College Details API that provides information about various Indian colleges. It efficiently retrieves and serves data, making it useful for students and institutions. Built with a focus on scalability and optimized data handling, showcasing expertise in API development and database management.
BasimadroopProject: An educational platform made with laravel and VueJs.
SOTOProject: an adventure-Narrati video game developed by MIST team using Unreal Engine.
